attributes.title: Terribale app
attributes.review: This took a while month to download and it’s soooooo bad like what the heck I waited a month for this no I want this app deleted fro. Apple NOW and trump is deleting Tik tok and that’s horrible

attributes.title: do NOT download
attributes.review: i downloaded to be caught up on my presidents life and administration BUT there’s hardly ever any movement. might as well just watch the news 😔🤟✨🤬

attributes.title: Poorly optimized
attributes.review: I’m on the iPhone 11 and for some reason when I Donald Trump is a s🧚‍♀️x offender he was best friends with Jeffrey Epstein and had him killed yeah so they should update the app

attributes.title: Orange
attributes.review: I have a terrible fear of the color orange. I have always feared such a color. I download this app to try to support my president but sadly when I looked at his face...... I fell into a coma. 🤧

attributes.title: just throw the whole app away
attributes.review: i waited so long for this app to download. and whenever i opened it, it closed down almost like a glitch. although the times i did have it open i had to see this big orange man on the screen... quite odd. anyway all in all i want this app to burn:)

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app caused so much discomfort in my home!! All of my family members turned racist!! Never downloading this again!!

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: this app is terrible. it was impossible to even open without crashing and it wasted more the 50% of my battery for just using it for 20 minutes. it’s takes up a lot of storage and i do not recommend downloading this app!!

attributes.title: ONE STAR !
attributes.review: This app is useless if u ever download it jus put 1 star it took forever to download jus annoying like ughh trump needs to do better in his life

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: Literally crashes every minute, needs to be taken off.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE TERRIBLE TERRIBLE!!!
attributes.review: Made my phone glitch and lag. I couldn’t load my other apps for hours after opening this app!! This is unforgivable, be very ashamed. 😡😡
